message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate your interest in selling the product to me, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm holding out for something closer to $11,000. Would you be willing to go up a bit?
I'm still interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500?
